summary: FAN CLUTCH SEPARATES WHILE THE ENGINES RUNNING.  HME HAS IDENTIFIED THE PROBLEM AS BEING THE INCORRECT FAN BLADES BY COLOR.  AIR DRIVE FAN CLUTCH USES BLACK COLOR FAN.  IF USING WHITE FAN WITH FAN CLUTCH CAUSES INCORRECT BALANCE AND FAN CLUTCH FAILURE.  THEY KNOW THEY HAVE BUILT THE TRUCK INCORRECTLY AND OFFER NO SUPPORT.  I HAVE ONE TRUCK THAT HAS FAILED TWICE AND ONE TRUCK THAT HAS FAILED ONCE.   THEY ARE KNOWINGLY INDANGERING FIREFIGHTERS LIVES!
